original_text: When the armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead, he too fell on his sword and died with him.
korean_text: 무기를 든 자가 사울이 죽음을 보고 자기도 자기 칼 위에 엎드러져 그와 함께 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: When the armor-bearer saw that Saul was dead
sentences.korean_translation: 무기 맨은 사울이 죽은 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: he too fell on his sword
